title: Post a Notice to Enter
description: A property manager needs to enter a tenant's unit for a non-emergency reason (e.g., preventative maintenance).

tasks.description: Identify the tenant and the reason for entry.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the unit and purpose of the visit.

tasks.description: Generate a formal 'Notice to Enter' document, specifying the date, time window, and reason.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a legally compliant notice.

tasks.description: Deliver the notice to the tenant according to state law (e.g., post on the door and mail).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the delivery of the notice.
